links.text: Overview | SAP HANA Cloud | SAP API Business Hub

servicePlans.name: hana
servicePlans.description: Creates a free and limited SAP HANA Cloud, SAP HANA database instance. These free tier instances have limited resources and features. They are not subject to SLAs and only community support is available. Free tier instances can be converted to paid tier instances at any time.

additionalWorkers.description: Number of additional workers for scale out systems

availabilityZonePlacement.description: Settings that enable the customer to ensure spatial proximity between their applications and the HANA instance

highAvailabilityCrossMultiAZEnabled.description: A flag to determine if the HA setup will be cross multi-availability zones or not

initialReplicaAvailabilityZone.description: This zone will be used by the initial replica

initialSourceAvailabilityZone.description: This zone will be used by the initial source

primaryAvailabilityZone.description: This zone will be used by the primary instance

secondaryAvailabilityZone.description: This zone will be used by the secondary instance, if defined in .disasterRecoveryMode

retentionDays.description: Specifies the retention period for a backup in days

disasterRecoveryMode.description: Disaster Recovery of the HANA instance

enabledservices.description: List of services of the HANA to be enabled

generateSystemPassword.description: Describes if the systempassword should be generated or not.

memoryScaleOut.description: HANA memory size (RAM) in GB for scale out systems

plugins.description: HANA Plugins list configured for HANA instance

serviceStopped.description: Describes if the system should be running or stopped

storage.description: Size of the Storage in GB

systempassword.description: Password to be set for tenant

update_strategy.description: preferred behaviour for version upgrades. with_restart: the database will be shut down and started again during the upgrade; without_restart: at some point active write transactions will be cancelled, after that the upgrade is effective without further downtime

vcpu.description: Number of vCPUs used by HANA

versionIndicator.description: The version of the service to use

initialSourceAvailabilityZone.description: This zone will be used by the initial source

primaryAvailabilityZone.description: This zone will be used by the primary instance

secondaryAvailabilityZone.description: This zone will be used by the secondary instance, if defined in .disasterRecoveryMode

vcpu.description: Number of vCPUs used by HANA

versionIndicator.description: The version of the service to use.

workerNodes.description: Items of additional workers for scale out systems

servicePlans.name: hana-cloud-connection
servicePlans.description: Connects an SAP HANA Cloud, SAP HANA database instance with an SAP HANA Cloud, data lake instance without additional costs.

datalakeID.description: Service instance GUID of the data-lake instance

datalakePassword.description: Password in the data lake instance

datalakeUser.description: User ID in the data lake instance

hanaID.description: Service instance GUID of the HANA instance

hanaUser.description: User ID for HANA (for example, SYSTEM)

servicePlans.name: relational-data-lake
servicePlans.description: Creates a free and limited SAP HANA Cloud, data lake instance. These free tier instances have limited resources and features. They are not subject to SLAs and only community support is available. Free tier instances can be converted to paid tier instances at any time.

retentionDays.description: Specifies the retention period for a backup in days

enableBackups.description: Describes if IQ backups are enabled or not

credentials.description: Credentials of connectivity service offering with connectivity_proxy service plan

fileContainer.description: Configuration of the Data Lake's default file container

trustBindings.description: Trusts bindings to be established with other services

items.description: List of aliases to aggregate to

generateSystemPassword.description: Describes if the systempassword should be generated or not.

enabled.description: Describes if the IQ instance should allocate extra resources in order to be resilient to availability zone outages

blankPadding.description: blank padding to be set in HDL

caseSensitivity.description: case sensitivity to be set in HDL

collation.description: collation to be set in HDL

ncharAccentSensitivity.description: AccentSensitivity to be used in nchar UCA collation to be set in HDL

ncharCaseSensitivity.description: CaseSensitivity to be used in nchar UCA collation to be set in HDL

ncharCollation.description: nchar collation to be set in HDL

ncharLocale.description: locale to be used in nchar UCA collation to be set in HDL

ncharPunctuationSensitivity.description: PunctuationSensitivity to be used in nchar UCA collation to be set in HDL

ncharSortType.description: SortType to be used in nchar UCA collation to be set in HDL

iqEnabled.description: Whether to provision an iq instance for the datalake or not.

provisioned_size_gib.description: Size of IQ persistence in GB

serviceStopped.description: Describes if the system should be running or stopped

storage_service_provider.description: The storage service provider to use.

storage_service_tier.description: The storage service tier to use.

systempassword.description: Password to be set for tenant

updateStrategy.description: Preferred behaviour for iq version upgrade

versionIndicator.description: The version of the service to use
